meanings.definition: The bottom or lower surface of an object.
meanings.sent1: The undersurface of the table was smooth and shiny.
meanings.sent2: She carefully examined the undersurface of the leaf for any signs of damage.
meanings.sent3: The cat found a cozy spot to nap on the warm undersurface of the rug.
meanings.sent4: As the storm passed, the undersurface of the clouds glowed with a pink hue.
meanings.sent5: The undersurface of the ocean sparkled with the reflection of the sun's rays.

meanings.definition: The underside or lower side of something.
meanings.sent1: He flipped the boat over to inspect the undersurface for any cracks.
meanings.sent2: The undersurface of the bridge was covered in graffiti.
meanings.sent3: The undersurface of the mushroom was surprisingly colorful.
meanings.sent4: The undersurface of the coin revealed intricate engravings.
meanings.sent5: The undersurface of the rock provided shelter for small creatures.
